description: Convert Data objects into Messages using any {field_name} from input data.

data.info: The data to convert to text.

template.info: The template to use for formatting the data. It can contain the keys {text}, {data} or any other key in the Data.

sep.info: The separator to use between data items when creating a single message.

message.info: Data as a single Message, with each input Data separated by Separator

data_list.info: Data as a list of new Data, each having `text` formatted by Template

success.data_parsed_to_message: Successfully parsed {count} data items to message (length: {length} characters)
success.data_parsed_to_list: Successfully parsed {count} data items to list

warnings.no_valid_data: No valid data items to parse.
warnings.empty_result: Template formatting resulted in empty text.

errors.parse_to_message_failed: Failed to parse data to message: {error}
errors.parse_to_list_failed: Failed to parse data to list: {error}
